https://www.rentalroost.com
Another step in overstock’s quest for real-estate. This site existed as a f hard-to-use zillow, but the selling point was the school and demographic data available. Along with the re-design we wanted consumers to look for properties based on their lifestyle. We thought our Safety, Education, Commute Time, and Nightlife scores would our competitve edge and what would differentiate us from the competition. We refreshed the old style and organized the data, the challenge was quality control working with an oversees team. The turnaround time was also extremely fast, which left little room for user testing. There’s still fixes and development to be done, but overall it was a considerable win over the previous site.
